Level.name: First Level
Level.Description: This is one hell of an awesome level!
Level.EndGameText: You killed them.. YOU KILLED ALL OF THEM!!! Do you feel like a hero yet?

Wave.name: Wave 1
Wave.Description:
Welcome aboard captain! Since this is your first mission let me explain how this ship works... Move your ship with WASD buttons on your console and shoot with SPACE. Yep, it's that simple to control a space ship since we made signed contract with Apple. The word is next gen iShips will have only one button! How awesome is this?
Anyway, back to the mission... As you know we are in war with those evil alien bastards and you have been chosen among the best pilots of Planet Earth in order to bring some democracy to their planet.
Oh! Look! There is a small squad of alien fighters! Quick, get them!

Wave.name: Wave 2
Wave.Description: Well, this was relatively easy. I wonder what they were doing so close to the Earth... Well, I guess we'll never learn. Your first and last mission, captain, is to deliver democracy to their homeland. Be careful thou, there may be more of them on the way and usually they are not this easy to defeat.

Wave.name: Wave 3
Wave.Description: Wow, that's more like it! Good job defeating them. By the way, is our ship damaged? If it is we may be loot some repair tools from some of the enemies. Open your eyes for the goodies.

Wave.name: Wave 4
Wave.Description: Hey cap, we just got an intel! It says that an alien convoy with some weapons is nearby! We need to take them down. May be we can loot some cool weapons while we doing it. If you manage to salvage some weapon, press CTRL button to use it. And captain, be careful, they will not hesitate to use those weapons.

Wave.name: Wave 5
Wave.Description: Whew... That was close... It is not the time to relax thou. More enemy waves are approaching. Prepare yourself, these seems to be more intelligent.

Wave.name: Wave 6
Wave.Description: Ok, we almost there. Best of them are preparing for the last stand so be careful, they may be suicidal.
